Package com.ibm.as400.access

Class ClientAccessDataStream

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.as400.access.DataStream
com.ibm.as400.access.ClientAccessDataStream
Direct Known Subclasses:
IFSCreateUserHandleRep, IFSCreateUserHandlerReq, IFSFreeUserHandlerReq, IFSUserHandle2Req, IFSUserHandleSeedRep, IFSUserHandleSeedReq, NLSExchangeAttrReply, NLSExchangeAttrRequest
public class ClientAccessDataStream extends DataStream
Base class for client access server data streams. Provides methods to access common client access data stream header.

      public boolean canUse()
